channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New details emerge about Japan's notorious WWII germ warfare program

item.title: Counting steps for health? Here's how many you really need

item.title: Woman killed by falling rocks after summiting world's 2nd-highest peak
item.description: Guan Jing was struck by falling rocks on Tuesday while descending K2, a day after reaching its summit, a government spokesperson said.

item.title: In juvenile detention, these students say they’re not learning — and it’s keeping them incarcerated
item.description: Florida shifted to virtual learning for youth in juvenile detention — and parents and students say it’s been a disaster.

item.title: Rabbits in Colorado are sprouting "horns." Here's why.
item.description: Viral photos have inspired a fluffle of unflattering nicknames, including "Frankenstein bunnies," "demon rabbits" and "zombie rabbits."

item.title: Tropical Storm Erin likely to become Atlantic season's first hurricane by Friday
item.description: Tropical Storm Erin was expected to become a hurricane by Friday, the U.S. National Hurricane Center said.

item.title: 8/13: The Takeout with Major Garrett

item.title: FBI returns stolen conquistador document to Mexico
item.description: The document, signed by Hernán Cortés in 1527, is thought to have been taken over three decades ago.

item.title: Zelensky meets Starmer ahead of US-Russia summit on Ukraine's future
item.description: The pair met in Downing Street ahead of Friday's summit between Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin.

item.title: German states debate who invented Bratwurst sausages
item.description: The German states of Bavaria and Thuringia are embroiled in a row over who can lay claim to inventing the Bratwurst.

item.title: Relationship and new album - what we learned from Taylor Swift on Travis Kelce's podcast
item.description: The pop superstar gives a rare insight into their life together and reveals details of her new album.

item.title: Los Angeles school year begins amid fears over immigration enforcement
